review: Works as described. I do wish it had a "launchpad" type setup to where I could set my most-used apps. Best I can figure out is to use the "recent apps". Performs well, though. Well worth the purchase, especially for using Amazon Prime and SlingTV.
author: Donny

review: I got this as a birthday present. Better than average search menu for videos, very fast. My only complaint is that I have not found a way to connect bluetooth headphones to it. It obviously has bluetooth support, so it would seem fairly minor to include this as an additional download, even if it mean  t buying amazon speakers or headphones. From searching I found a android apk that would work but there is an audio lag.I can't honestly recommend it.
author: Cheryl B.

review: My husband absolutely loves this.  Took all of 3 minutes to set up.  Works almost like our Kindle so it's easy to get used to.  Hoping more things become available at no charge! :-)
author: kam mommy

review: Wow! I am totally surprised, this thing is outstanding.My kids are watching cartoons as I type this through the Fire Stick,lol. Thank You Amazon,I am going to buy 3 more of these, for each room we have, says my Wife,lol. "NOT". I give this 5 stars across the board, and would give it moreStars if I could. BUY THIS, if you have an HDMI tv, and decent ISP, you must buy this thing.OMG, its outstanding, youtube is hooked to me now,Along with my Amazon Prime, it was so so so easy, plug & play, and within 4 mins I was up and running.Easy to navigate, easy to add apps.,and easy to setup , how can you go wrong ?? Especially for this Price. Amazon, you got it together with this thing. The Remote works veryNice also. Hope this helps those who are being cautious.....don't , this works, hands down. And Amazon has a money back warranty.Jim

review: Kept dropping the wifi , freezing up and would check wifi signal and it would say very good . But freeze up a lot . Took back to store my internet is 50 Mbps , newer router .. So that wasn't the problem .
